title: Riot, what the fuck.
body:
What part of this %%%%s a troll didnt you get a month ago?

I am currently still playing the game from this screen shot for anyone who would like to spectate it, just as an update hes 0/4 now at 8 minutes in.

Edit: 0/5 now

Edit: 0/6

Edit: 2/7 hes not started getting kills to make it look like hes having a bad game, one of his tricks that stops him from getting banned.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oh3XpVXo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-06-13T23:17:05.875+0000)
>
> Cool story mate.

What a story mark

Firstly. Riot isn't going to ban someone because you spam on the forums, actually.. they may ban you for going against their guidelines.

Secondly, riot has a LOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT of trolls to deal with. it takes time... calm down, nothing you are doing will make things better.

Thirdly, if you go... idk, 1-14, in a game, while he goes 9-12... how is he going to get banned for intentionally feeding?

from a statistical standpoint, the ban will be ignored. 

if team has 30 deaths, and 1 player has 8, most likely it has just been a bad game...

if he honestly is a troll who continually trolls and intentionally feeds... he will be banned, just wait it out, sheesh. 

atm, all you're doing, is not only stooping to his level, but also trolling the game... you decided to go 1-14-2, because you saw a guy you didn't like was on your team...

guess what... there are 3 other players on your team, who have nothing to do with it.. so yeah.. you just intentionally fed/afk'd/gave up for the rest of your team. who will most likely report you, not him.
Just PM me and we can talk it out, it is obvious you have some problems that can't be solved with you spamming the forums. {{champion:20}}

You know, that troll that i have been name and shaming for the last FUCKING YEAR

and everytime, a riot employee fucking protects the %%%% by removing the name, and he gets away scott fucking free.

I mean fuck dude, the reason im spending more time on the boards right now than actually playing the game, is i gave up the second i saw him.

He is a walking unwinnable game.

I think you need to just calm down and find another game, you obviously get too angry over League and it's affecting you negatively. When I get fed up with League I usually transition to something like Fallout 4 where I can just sit back, relax and play by myself without having to worry about other people and keeping up with their standards.
When you go 1/14/2 on full crit soraka support and then go to the forums and accuse someone of trolling... Maybe you need to take a look in the mirror.  {{champion:266}}
You're in bronze 5. Why not just rank up so you don't have him in your games anymore.

I get pretty frustrated and tilted from my Ranked games but that's the worst mindset to play league with.

Honestly, just keep being vigilant and sending in reports during your post-screen lobby. 

If this person who you are implying is a feeder and isn't just having a 'bad' game, then eventually the system will detect them and you can only hope other people use their voice and send a report in after the game. As mentioned above, Riot probably has HEAPS of other summoners they need to deal with.

The best thing is to start flaming and fueling a team argument or even across game argument where you flame in all chat. 

Keep positive and ignore them and focus on your own gameplay and just use that report button!

Justice will be served _(PLZ RITO)_
